column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ A group of Chinese troublemakers were caught fleeing Koh Pich after provoking a fight. This happened at 13:30  on November 2
column4: 2018 at ------Koh Pich------ entertainment center in Tonle Bassac commune. Phnom Penh.------Three Chinese nationals and one Cambodian driver arrested remain unidentified.------A security source told a TVFB on Koh Pich that
column6: a white car carrying five or six Chinese passengers stopped at the Euro Tower
column7: got out and started brawling.  3 Chinese and 1 car driver were taken in by police
column8: while the remaining entourage others escaped.------The men were taken to Inspectorate of Police Chamkarmon for further inquiries.------https://tvfb.news/article/15685------(function(d

column14: 'facebook-jssdk'));------ព័ត៌មានទាន់ហេតុការណ៍៖------ព័ត៌មានបឋម៖ ករណីជនជាតិចិនដេញវាយគ្នា បង្កឲ្យមានការភ្ញាក់ផ្អើលដល់បងប្អូនប្រជាពលរដ្ឋដែលនៅកន្ឡែងហេតុ ហេតុការណ៍េះកើតឡើងកាលពីវេលាម៉ោង ១និង៣០នាទី ថ្ងៃទី០២ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០១៨ នៅក្នុងនៅកោះពេជ្យ ស្ថិតនៅក្នុងសង្កាត់ចតុមុខ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញា​ ។------បាន​បង្ហោះ​ដោយ ------TVFB------ នៅ ថ្ងៃព្រហស្បតិ៍ 1 វិច្ឆិកា 2018
